item.title: CognitiveDrone: A VLA Model and Evaluation Benchmark for Real-Time Cognitive Task Solving and Reasoning in UAVs
item.description: CognitiveDrone: A novel VLA model and benchmark for real-time cognitive UAV tasks, improving reasoning and control.

item.title: Inverse Bridge Matching Distillation
item.description: Boosting Diffusion Bridge Models: A new distillation technique accelerates inference speed by 4x to 100x, sometimes even improving image quality!
